Summary: A very fast flying bright object.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Nairobi
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was in December when my whole family and i decided to go to the reserve in tharaka district for xmas with my grandmother.It was at night when we all were outside having fun at that time.i was relaxing on a chair,my head facing up looking at the beautiful sky because it was quite clear at that time with only the full moon in view.just as i was looking at the sky, this brightly shinning passing object flew past the naked sky quite fast like almost 2 seconds and then it disappeared from sight.A series of thoughts started darting in my mind.what can it be? i wondered.Would it be a shooting star.i really had no idea at that time.I decided the following day to sit exactly where i was to see if it will pass again.but it never did.
